sentences.en: It soon became clear that authors were decidedly in the majority.
sentences.cn: 作家占绝大多数，这一点很快就变得明了起来。

sentences.en: Members of parliament approved the move by a majority of ninety-nine.
sentences.cn: 议员以99张的多数票批准了这项动议.

sentences.en: MPs approved the Bill by a majority of 97.
sentences.cn: 议员们以97票的多数票通过了该议案。

sentences.en: publishing houses where women are in the majority.
The Labour Party won a huge majority at the last general election.
sentences.cn: 工党在上次大选中以巨大的票数优势获胜。

sentences.en: The majority obtained their positions through the old boy network.
sentences.cn: 大多数人都是通过校友关系谋得其职位的。

sentences.en: The majority of British women adopt their husband's surname when they marry.
sentences.cn: 大多数英国女性结婚后随夫姓。

sentences.en: The majority of foreign nationals working here have work permits.
sentences.cn: 大多数在这里工作的外国人都有工作许可证。

sentences.en: The majority of people in this country pay their whack.
sentences.cn: 该国大部分人尽了他们的一份力。

sentences.en: The majority of sex offenders have a low opinion of themselves.
sentences.cn: 大多数性犯罪者都瞧不起自己。

sentences.en: The majority of us feel worried if we walk through a subway.
sentences.cn: 大多数人在走地下通道时都感到害怕。

sentences.en: The majority of working women are in low-paid jobs.
sentences.cn: 大部分工作女性处于低薪的岗位。

sentences.en: The men voted by a four-to-one majority to accept the pay offer.
sentences.cn: 男雇员以4比1的多数票接受了工资条件。

sentences.en: The Society maintains that the majority of cross-dressers are heterosexual.
sentences.cn: 该协会认为大多数变装者都是异性恋。

sentences.en: The vast majority of our cheeses are made with pasteurised milk.
sentences.cn: 我们生产的绝大部分奶酪都是用巴氏消毒过的牛奶制成的。

sentences.en: The vast majority of the attentive audience applauded these sentiments.
sentences.cn: 大多数聚精会神听讲的观众都对这些观点表示赞赏。

sentences.en: Whatever the majority decided I was prepared to go along with.
sentences.cn: 只要是多数人的决定我都愿意服从。

words.tran_cn: 主要的；重要的；主修的；较多的
[人类] 成年人；主修科目；陆军少校

phrases.tran_cn: 沉默的大多数（持温和观点并很少发表意见者）
过半数；一般多数， 简单多数

trans.tran_cn: 多数，多数票，超出其余各方票数总和的票数，法定成年年龄
trans.tran_en: most of the people or things in a group
